about_the_game:
You play as Howard, a man desperate to escape, but the world around him has twisted into something unrecognizable. His journey takes him through bizarre and disturbing places, crawling with grotesque creatures and strange characters. As he unravels his role in this nightmarish reality, it becomes clear that escaping will be far more difficult than he ever imagined.

Features


  • CLEVER PUZZLES: Some puzzles change depending on the chosen difficulty
  • UNIQUE HANDCRAFTED MONSTERS: Forget the boring zombies―these monsters are designed with love and care to grant you memorable moments every time you meet one.
  • DETAILED ENVIRONMENTS AND TERRIFYING ATMOSPHERE: Filled with blood, gore, and a bit of dark humor
  • COMBAT: Face the horrors head-on, because sometimes the only way to survive is to fight back.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood, gore, and intense violence.

name: My Last Friday

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3800XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 6800, 16 GB

short_description: My Last Friday is a first-person horror-adventure game with a disturbing atmosphere, clever puzzles, body horror, and tense combat. Explore a twisted world, confront terrifying enemies, and endure the nightmarish challenges ahead.
